tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE InvestmentPortfolio (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_name VARCHAR(255),
    asset_type VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
    current_value DECIMAL(10, 2),
    quantity INT,
    total_investment DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE portfolio_data (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(50),
    purchase_date DATE,
    purchase_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    shares_owned INT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    stock_symbol VARCHAR(50),
    return_on_investment DECIMAL(10,2),
    volatility DECIMAL(10,2),
    sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE Investment (
    investment_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id UUID NOT NULL,
    investment_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    investment_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    investment_value DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (portfolio_id) REFERENCES Portfolio(portfolio_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    investment_id UUID NOT NULL,
    transaction_date DATE NOT NULL,
    transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL(15, 2) NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (investment_id) REFERENCES Investment(investment_id)
);

CREATE TABLE Holdings (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	security_id INT,
	portfolio_id INT,
	number_of_shares DECIMAL,
	cost_basis DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE Transactions (
	id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	security_id INT,
	transaction_date DATE,
	transaction_type VARCHAR,
	amount DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE portfolios (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id UUID,
    portfolio_name STRING,
    total_value DECIMAL,
    created_at TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE holdings (
    holding_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id UUID,
    asset_name STRING,
    quantity DECIMAL,
    cost_price DECIMAL,
    purchase_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE transactions (
    transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    holding_id UUID,
    transaction_type STRING,
    transaction_amount DECIMAL,
    transaction_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
    metric_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    portfolio_id UUID,
    metric_name STRING,
    metric_value DECIMAL,
    calculation_date DATE
);
